siteInfo.englishName: Life Electro Acupressure Therapy Health Centre
siteInfo.description: Professional acupressure therapy for knee pain, cervical issues, back pain, constipation, sciatica, and paralysis. Experience natural healing with our expert electro-acupressure treatments.

address.english: Subhash chowk ( Nahar Road) kaptanganj, Kushinagar

hero.title: लाईफ इलेक्ट्रो एक्यूप्रेशर थेरेपी हेल्थ सेंटर
hero.subtitle: Natural Pain Relief & Healing
hero.description: Professional acupressure therapy for knee pain, cervical issues, back pain, constipation, sciatica, and paralysis. Experience natural healing with our expert electro-acupressure treatments.

card.title: Expert Care Since Years
card.description: Trusted by thousands of patients for natural pain relief

services.title: Our Specialized Treatments
services.description: We offer comprehensive electro-acupressure therapy for various health conditions using natural healing methods and modern techniques.

list.title: Knee Pain Treatment
list.description: Specialized electro-acupressure therapy for knee joint pain, arthritis, and mobility issues.

list.title: Cervical Pain Relief
list.description: Effective treatment for neck pain, cervical spondylosis, and related headaches.

list.title: Back Pain Therapy
list.description: Comprehensive treatment for lower back pain, disc problems, and muscle tension.

list.title: Digestive Health
list.description: Natural treatment for constipation, digestive disorders, and stomach-related issues.

list.title: Sciatica Treatment
list.description: Targeted therapy for sciatic nerve pain, leg numbness, and related symptoms.

list.title: Paralysis Recovery
list.description: Supportive therapy for paralysis patients to improve mobility and nerve function.

about.title: Why Choose Life Electro Acupressure?
about.description: We combine traditional acupressure techniques with modern electro-therapy to provide effective, natural healing solutions. Our approach focuses on treating the root cause of pain and promoting overall wellness.

features.title: Flexible Timings
features.description: Convenient appointment slots to fit your schedule

features.title: Natural Healing
features.description: Drug-free treatment with no side effects

card.title: Modern Facilities
card.description: Clean, comfortable treatment rooms equipped with the latest electro-acupressure technology for optimal healing results.

condition.label: Health Condition
condition.placeholder: e.g., Knee pain, Back pain, Cervical

footer.title: Life Electro Acupressure
footer.description: Dedicated to providing natural healing solutions through professional electro-acupressure therapy. Your health and wellness is our priority.
